tic_tac_toe.title: Word Study: Suffixes –ive, -age, and –ize
tic_tac_toe.directions: Play Tic-Tac-Toe by choosing the answer from the word box that correctly matches the definition. Then place your “X” on the board. Three spaces in a row (across, down, or diagonal) wins.
